name: Fertilizante
description: Imbuyes el suelo a tu alrededor con una capa mística de energía natural, como si labraras tierra fresca. Durante tres rondas, las criaturas de tipo Planta duplican su bonificador por STAB al activar un movimiento de tipo Planta dentro del área afectada.

effect.name: Gets the Pokémon pumped up. Helps prevent nervousness, too.
effect.effect: Doubles the Appeal Points of a successful move in the next round. Pokemon also has advantage on CHA Saving Throws until after their move next round is performed.
